title: TWISTED TREE LINE RANKED PLEASE
body: Please Riot give us twisted treeline ranked  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

_(gotta cover all the bases, thanks to good ol' Political correctness!)_

Our prayers have been answered!

> *(gotta cover all the bases, thanks to good ol' Political correctness!)*

Except you missed the blessed lord Gabe Newell...

Not sure if I should feel offended.

Im so so so sorry.

I also missed the giant spaghetti monster and Nagakageburos...

Im a failure..

> Im so so so sorry.

You are forgiven.

May your PC be powerful and your summer sales cheap.

I logged into oce boards to just say please!!!!
I will be so grateful if you could open this queue, is it possible at all once you guys merge flex and solo ladders on oce (don't pretend it's not gonna happen :P ) ?
E: I just saw the announcment, awesome !

Please Riot there should also be a ranked ARAM! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
As cool as it might seem, there's not much balance on the map. I don't see it being very healthy.
